p: Human embryonic kidney cell line HEK293T (ATCC) and the kidney epithelial cell line Vero (ATCC) were grown in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM, Dutscher, Issy-les-Moulineaux, France) or modified Eagle’s medium (MEM, Dutscher) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum heat inactivated (FBS, Dutscher) and completed with 2 mmol.L -1 l-glutamine (Dutscher), 100 U.mL -1–0.1 mg.mL -1 penicillin-streptomycin (Dutscher), 1 mmol.L -1 sodium pyruvate (Dutscher) and 250 μg.mL -1 amphotericin (Dutscher). Cells were maintained in a humidified atmosphere of 5% CO 2 at 37°C in Petri dishes.
